name: Split Second
description:
Split Second  Make Every Second Count

Explore and delve deep into a forgotten factory where lost technology is yet to be discovered. Dodge and maneuver your through the factory's machines as you go deeper and deeper.

Features

  • Control your square and venture through the forgotten factory in this 2D puzzle platformer.  
  • Watch your surroundings as your only two abilities is to slow down time within an area and maneuver with a jetpack.
  • A minimalistic style with shapes shadows in a dark poorly lit underground factory  

Split Second was made in two weeks for the Academy of Art University course : Rapid Game Development.
